name: Bran Bread
description: A hearty and wholesome bran bread, rich in fiber and perfect for a healthy start to your day or for nutritious sandwiches.

name: Brioche Bread
description: A light, fluffy, and slightly sweet brioche bread, known for its rich buttery flavor. Excellent for French toast or indulgent sandwiches.

name: Butter Bread
description: A soft and delicious bread with a hint of buttery goodness, versatile for toasting or making your favorite sandwiches.

name: Chicken Bread
description: A savory delight! Soft bread filled with seasoned, tender chicken pieces, perfect for a satisfying snack or light meal.

name: Countryside Bread
description: A rustic and hearty countryside loaf, with a perfectly baked crust and soft interior. Ideal for any meal.

name: Focaccia Bread
description: Authentic Italian flatbread, dimpled and often flavored with olive oil, herbs like rosemary, and sea salt. Perfect for dipping or as a sandwich base.

name: French Bread
description: Classic French baguette with a crisp crust and soft, airy interior. Perfect for sandwiches, crostini, or enjoying with cheese and wine.

name: Fruit Bread
description: A sweet and delightful bread loaf, generously studded with mixed dried fruits and often a hint of spice. Perfect toasted with butter.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Crusty bread infused with aromatic garlic and butter, often with herbs. A perfect accompaniment to pasta dishes or enjoyed on its own.

name: House Bread
description: Our signature loaf, a versatile and delicious bread perfect for everyday enjoyment. Baked fresh with quality ingredients.

name: Marshall Bread
description: A special Marshall Bakery creation, this bread offers a unique taste and texture. Perfect for toasting or sandwiches.

name: Milky Bread
description: A soft, tender, and slightly sweet bread enriched with milk, making it exceptionally smooth. Great for children and adults alike.

name: Multi Seed Bread
description: A wholesome and nutritious bread packed with a variety of seeds like flax, sesame, sunflower, and pumpkin seeds, offering a delightful crunch and flavor.

name: Whole Wheat Bread
description: Healthy and delicious whole wheat bread, rich in fiber and nutrients. A perfect choice for a balanced diet.

name: Butter Croissant
description: A classic French delight, this croissant is exceptionally flaky, buttery, and light. Perfect with coffee or on its own.

name: Chocolate Croissant
description: Indulge in our buttery, flaky croissant filled with rich, decadent chocolate. A perfect treat for any time of day.

name: Crispy Croissant
description: Experience the ultimate crunch with our extra crispy croissant, boasting layers of flaky pastry baked to golden perfection.

name: Croissant Mini Pack of 6
description: Enjoy a delightful selection of six mini butter croissants, perfect for sharing or a multi-day treat. Flaky, buttery, and bite-sized.

name: Multiseed Croissant
description: A wholesome twist on a classic! Our flaky butter croissant generously topped with a blend of nutritious seeds for added texture and flavor.

name: Zaatar Croissant
description: A savory delight, this flaky croissant is infused with the aromatic and tangy flavor of Zaatar spice blend. A unique and delicious choice.

name: Black Cumin Bun Mini Pack of 6
description: A pack of six delightful mini buns flavored with aromatic black cumin seeds, offering a unique and savory taste. Perfect for sliders or small snacks.

name: Bran Bun Mini Pack of 6
description: A healthy choice! Six mini bran buns, rich in fiber and perfect for creating wholesome mini sandwiches or enjoying as a light snack.

name: Bran Bun
description: A soft and wholesome bran bun, rich in fiber. Ideal for healthy burgers or as a side with your meal.

name: Brioche Bun
description: Light, fluffy, and slightly sweet brioche bun with a rich buttery flavor. Perfect for gourmet burgers or elevated sandwiches.

name: Burger Bun
description: Classic soft and fluffy burger bun, perfectly sized and textured to hold your favorite patties and toppings. Often topped with sesame seeds.

name: Chocolate Chip Bun Mini Pack of 6
description: A sweet treat! Pack of six mini buns generously studded with delicious chocolate chips. Perfect for kids or a delightful snack.

name: Chocolate Chip Bun
description: A soft and sweet bun filled with delightful chocolate chips. A perfect treat for any time of the day.

name: Dinner Roll Bun
description: Soft, light, and slightly sweet dinner roll, perfect as an accompaniment to any meal or for small sandwiches.

name: Dinner Roll Bun Mini Pack of 6
description: Pack of six soft and light mini dinner rolls. Ideal for serving with meals, for parties, or for creating bite-sized appetizers.

name: Fruit Bun Mini Pack of 6
description: A delightful pack of six mini sweet buns, dotted with mixed dried fruits. A tasty snack, especially when lightly toasted.

name: Fruit Bun
description: A soft, sweet bun speckled with mixed dried fruits and often a hint of spice. Perfect for a tea-time treat.

name: Fruit Sheermal
description: Traditional saffron-flavored sweet flatbread, often enriched with milk and studded with dried fruits. A festive and delicious treat.

name: Hotdog Bun
description: Classic elongated soft bun, perfectly shaped to cradle your favorite hot dog and toppings. A must-have for BBQs and quick meals.

name: Plain Bun Mini Pack of 6
description: A versatile pack of six plain mini buns. Soft, fluffy, and perfect for sliders, small sandwiches, or as a side.

name: Plain Bun
description: A simple, soft, and fluffy plain bun. Versatile for any use, from small burgers to a side with soup.

name: Plain Sheermal
description: Traditional saffron-flavored sweet flatbread, enriched with milk, with a soft and slightly dense texture. A delightful treat on its own or with tea.

name: Spicy Bun
description: A soft bun with a kick! Infused with a blend of spices for a warm and savory flavor. Great for adding excitement to your meal.

name: Whole Wheat Bun
description: A healthy and soft whole wheat bun, offering a good source of fiber. Perfect for nutritious burgers or sandwiches.

name: Bran Rusk Flat
description: Crispy and wholesome flat bran rusks, rich in fiber. Perfect for a healthy tea-time snack or a light breakfast.

name: Fruit Cake Rusk
description: Deliciously crispy rusk made from fruit cake, packed with mixed dried fruits and a hint of spice. A delightful treat to dunk in tea or coffee.

name: Ginger Cake Rusk
description: Crispy and aromatic rusk made from ginger cake, offering a warm, spicy flavor. Perfect with a hot beverage on a chilly day.

name: Sweet Rusk
description: Classic sweet and crispy rusk, twice-baked for that perfect crunch. Ideal for dipping in tea or coffee, a timeless favorite.
